item.description:
For October we will be reading Incendiary by Chris Cleave.  

A story about an al-Qa'ida suicide attack on London, published on 7 July 2005: Chris Cleave's first novel, is written in the form of a victim's letter to Osama bin Laden.

Also, I am looking for a volunteer to take over the book club for 2012.  As with the last organizer, I have led the group for a year and look forward to someone else picking the books for the next year!  All you have to do is chose the book and schedule the monthly meetup.  If you are interested, please send me an email.

I'm looking forward to seeing everyone at the end of October.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: October's Book Club
